column1: Magnetic resonance image (MRI) size (128, 256, 1) capturing the head of a man aged  of 37 years old, with a sequence weighted in T2 and sagittal section. The specific slice is number 132, counted from the right hemisphere of the skull. The image reveals the presence of the fourth ventricle of volume 63.2812 mm³, the brainstem of volume 1095.5566 mm³, the cerebrospinal fluid of volume 72.5098 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 1492.3828 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 7650.4395 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 324.3164 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 154.2480 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1777.1484 mm³, the right thalamus proper of volume 352.0020 mm³ and the right ventral diencephalon of volume 261.0352 mm³.
